tika.dc.description:
No matter the breads you prefer--soft challah, crusty sourdough, flaky croissants, wholesome corn bread, chewy baguettes, or crumbly scones--this handy pocket-size Totally Bread Cookbook is sure to satiate the cravings of every bread-lover.

From the Trade Paperback edition.
tika.dc.rights: Copyright © 1999 by Helene Siegel and Karen Gillingham
